attributes.action: Increase the 90 day tax rule whereby tax is payable by expats on monies earned outside of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring the UK in line with other European Union countries by increasing the number of days an expatriate can spend in the UK each year, before having to pay tax on his worldwide earnings, to 183 (ish) days.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase the 90 day tax rule whereby tax is payable by expats on monies earned outside of the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13445.asp
